title: Zoo City
description: WHERE NO ONE ELSE DARE VENTURE…Zinzi has a Sloth on her back, a dirty online 419 scam habit – and a talent for finding lost things. But when her latest client, a little old lady, turns up dead and the cops confiscate her lastpaycheck, she’s forced to take on her least favourite kind of missing personsThe award-winning novel by the Author of The Shining Girls  and the highly-acclaimed Moxyland .FILE Urban Fantasy [Gangster Shamen / Symbiotic Familiars / Teen Star Missing / Everything Breaks]
author: Lauren Beukes
